title: Warm Winter Blankets
description: Provide warm blankets to families in rural areas to protect them from the harsh winter cold.

title: Jackets for Kids
description: Donate cozy jackets to children living in underprivileged communities.

title: Sweaters for Elderly
description: Help the elderly stay warm by donating woolen sweaters.

title: Winter Shoes for All
description: Provide sturdy winter shoes to people in rural areas to protect their feet from the cold.

title: Scarves and Beanies Drive
description: Distribute scarves and beanies to families struggling to stay warm.

title: Thermal Wear for Women
description: Provide thermal innerwear to women in low-income areas to ensure warmth and comfort.
